content: wooly windows specs ewe ewe yarns pattern #265 designed by heather walpole sizes baby teen/small adult large adult measurements 14 18 22 inches around 5 7 8 in high yarn ewe ewe wooly worsted 100% merino 95 yards color a 1 skein 92 wheat color b 1 skein 70 aquamarine crochet hook size j/10 6 mm supplies darning needle gauge 4 tc clusters over 4 note instructions are written in us crochet terminology some sizes only work certain row the hat is worked in the round begin foundation with color a chain 48 54 60 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring being careful not to twist foundation chain round 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each chain around slip_stitch to top of chain 3 48 54 60 double_crochet round 2 chain 2 *1 fpdc around first double_crochet bpdc around next double_crochet repeat from * around slip_stitch to top of chain 2 48 54 60 double_crochet round 3 size s & l only work as for round 2 round 4 all sizes chain 1 1 single_crochet in first double_crochet *chain 2 skip next 2 double_crochet 1 single_crochet in next double_crochet 1 chain-2 space made repeat from * around to the last 2 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet slip_stitch to first single_crochet 16 18 20 chain-2 spaces made windows round 5 with color b chain 5 counts as last tc of round *3 tc in crown next chain-2 space chain 1 repeat from * around to last chain-2 space 2 tc in last chain-2 space join with slip_stitch to 4 chain of the starting chain 16 18 con d 20 tc clusters round 6 gently lift color a behind work with color a chain 1 1 single_crochet in first chain-1 space *chain 2 skip 3 tc 1 single_crochet in next chain-1 space repeat from * around to last chain-1 space chain 2 slip_stitch to first single_crochet 16 18 20 single_crochet round 7
